actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT Docket,
			WB_Docket,
			Date,
			GMT,
			Product,
			Total_Jas
 FROM (SELECT Docket, 
	 				WB_Docket, 
	 				Date,
					MONTHNAME(Date) as Month,
					WEEK(Date) as Week,
	 				YEAR(Date) as Year,
			    CONCAT(ANY_VALUE(Grade),'-',ANY_VALUE(Length)) as Product, 
	 				Rego, 
	 				Supplier, 
	 				Operations, 
	 				FPP, 
	 				Coupe, 
	 				Harvestor, 
	 				GMT 
	 FROM WeighBridge) W
LEFT JOIN
	(SELECT  Doc, 
					IFNULL(p + rejects,p) as Pieces, 
					IFNULL(rejectjas,0) as Rejected, 
					Received, 
					IFNULL(rejectjas + Received, Received) as Total_Jas,
	 				SDate,
	 				Loc
				FROM
					(SELECT Docket as Doc, 
					 COUNT(Docket) as p, 
					 SUM(JAS) as Received, 
					 ANY_VALUE(Date) as SDate,
					 ANY_VALUE(Location) as Loc
					 FROM Scaling GROUP BY Docket) v
				LEFT JOIN
					(SELECT Docket as D, 
					 COUNT(Docket) as rejects, 
					 SUM(JAS) as rejectjas  
					 FROM Reject_Scaling GROUP BY Docket) r
				ON r.D = v.Doc ) S
ON W.Docket = S.Doc HAVING IFNULL(Total_Jas,0) = 0 ORDER BY Date ASC, Docket ASC;
